mapper.select: select * from member order by mem_idx asc
select * from member where mem_idx=#{ mem_idx }
select * from member where mem_id=#{ mem_id }
mapper.insert: insert into member values( (select nvl(max(mem_idx),0)+1 from member), #{ mem_name }, #{ mem_id }, #{ mem_pwd }, #{ mem_zipcode }, #{ mem_address }, default, default)
mapper.delete: delete from member where mem_idx=#{ mem_idx }
